text: "Sing Our Own Song" is a 1986 song by English band UB40 and is the ninth and final track from their seventh studio album Rat in the Kitchen. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in the Netherlands, number 7 in New Zealand and Belgium, number 76 in Australia and number 4 in Ireland. It was heavily censored in South Africa. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:UB40 songs Category:Reggae songs Category:Protest songs
title: Sing Our Own Song
